About Us

Foster Worldwide Exim Pvt. Ltd.(Formerly known as FOSTER LOGISTICS) is a young, energetic, and professional logistics company offering Total Logistics Solutions tailored to meet the global shipping needs of our clients.

We specialize in moving cargo seamlessly across borders by Air, Sea, or Land ensuring fast transit, cost effective rates, and reliable delivery with multiple carrier options. Our client centric approach and commitment to excellence help us build long term partnerships based on trust, efficiency, and performance.

With a global network and a dedicated team, we turn complex logistics into smooth, stress free experiences.

We don’t just move cargo — we move businesses forward.

Partner with Foster Worldwide Exim Pvt. Ltd. and experience logistics the smart way.

Our Vision

To be recognized as a leading global logistics partner, delivering excellence, innovation, and reliability in every shipment.

Our Mission

To provide our clients with efficient, customized, and transparent logistics solutions, ensuring their cargo reaches its destination safely, quickly, and cost effectively every single time.

Our Services

International Freight Forwarding (Air & Sea)

Customs Clearance & Documentation

Door-to-Door Delivery Services

Warehousing & Distribution

Multimodal Transport Solutions

Project Cargo Handling

Import & Export Consulting

Cargo Insurance & Compliance Support
